channel.title: github pages on jkpark Demo
channel.description: Recent content in github pages on jkpark Demo

item.title: Hosting on GitHub Pages
item.description: Create New Repository on the github *reffered https://gohugo.io/hosting-and-deployment/hosting-on-github/ create new public Repository on github. in my case, I created repo for demo site. https://github.com/jkpark/hugo-theme-jkpark-demo.git import your hugo folder into github goto your hugo folder which we made from the previous post. cd demo git add . git commit -m "first commit" git branch -M main git remote add origin https://github.com/jkpark/hugo-theme-jkpark-demo.git git push -u origin main now, hugo server is placed in the your github repo.
